ygData.subject: Re: BACK to wizards...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have some time and am willing to compile something if people will give me the info. Let s take this email as a request. Anyone with anything remotely usefull
ygData.messageBody:
I have some time and am willing to compile something if people will give me
the info.

Let's take this email as a request. Anyone with anything remotely usefull
about Wizards,
quests, armor, items, jewelry, good zones, where to hunt what, how to do what
anything at all that you feel would help others send it to me and i'll put
together
some sort of FAQ or maybe even slap it up on a website, depending on how much
info i get.



At 05:13 PM 6/14/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: James Dwyer <jdwar@...>
>
>I've noticed an alarmingly low amount of information about wizards out
>there (on the net and such). There are several websites dedicated to
>many of the other classes from warriors to rogues and druids to
>necromancers. We need a place for wizards. Hehe, not that I have the
>time or energy to do this, but I have enough to recognize the need!
>
>Any ideas on what to do? Rather than having all the same questions asked
>here over and over again we can have a central repository of information
>(faq?). Like for instance, strategies at certain levels, where to hunt,
>spell combinations, class combinations, etc. Let me know if anyone is
>interested maybe we can make something work :)
>
>Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Looking for a new hobby? Want to make a new friend?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Come join one of 170,000 e-mail communities at ONElist!

-------------------------------------------------
Saleen : High Elf Wizard - Xegony
saleengt@...
